snippet: Voters have been left largely in the dark about who is putting the most money behind Senator Marco Rubio’s campaign for the Republican presidential nomination.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

abstract: Political nonprofit group Conservative Solutions Project is funding millions of dollars worth of television ads for Republican presidential candidate Marco Rubio, raising new questions about elasticity of campaign finance regulations; group is not legally required to provide names of its donors, awkward fact for Rubio, whose campaign has stressed on transparency in funding.
lead_paragraph: Voters have been left largely in the dark about who is putting the most money behind Senator Marco Rubio’s campaign for the Republican presidential nomination.

headline.print_headline: Nonprofit Masks Source of Ads Backing Rubio
headline.main: Nonprofit Masks Source of Ads Backing Rubio
